headline: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. Declares Dividends on Preferred Stock
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., November 03, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced that its board of directors has declared the following dividends on its preferred stock payable on January 6, 2026, to preferred shareholders of record at the close of business on December 22, 2025:
